document_name: Fortalecimiento de capacidades para la implementacion de la legislacion nacional sobre igualdad de genero  y no violencia contra las mujeres en Mexico

donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
outputs.output_descr:
With an initial contribution of the Gender Thematic Trust Fund (GTTF), UNDP has successfully managed to mobilize funds in order to work with counterparts such as: the National Institute of Women, the Health and Education Ministry's and the Ministry of Interior at the federal level. It has also expanded its agenda toward the states of Zacatecas, Guerrero, Estado de Mexico and Chiapas.
At the state level the focus has been to strengthen institutional capacities of local women's institutions, the legislative and NGOs. Its main outputs are 8 Guidance Gender documents, that reflect the particularities of each state, and that provide stakeholders the basis to: (i) Implement gender based approaches in the development of public policies, specially health and education; (ii) Introduce gender perspective into public policies media campaigns and; (iii) Promote  harmonization of the national gender legal framework. It has also provided a useful local platform to achieve the corporative goal of MDG 3 Improve gender Equality and Empower Women.
outputs.output_title: Fort. de Cap. Impl. de la Leg.

project_descr: Fortalecimiento de Capacidades para la Implementación de la Legislación Nacional sobre Igualdad de Género y No Violencia contra las Mujeres en México
project_title: Fort. de Cap. Impl. de la Leg. Nal. Igual.y No Viol.
